item.title: About
item.description: Education I’m currently an undergraduate student at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. Club involvement includes Aerospace Club (division: UAV IARC Team ) and eSAB (engineering student advisory board). The goal of the IARC team is to build an autonomous UAV to compete in the International Aerial Robotics Competition. The goal of eSAB is to facilitate a relationship between engineering students, engineering RSOs(recognized student organization), and the college of engineering as a whole(faculty and staff).

item.title: Contact
item.description: Academic Email: Gersongru@ huskers.unl.edu Personal Email: Gersongru@ gmail.com If you would like to contact me by phone number, please refer to the top of my resume.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Project List WetSpace - mBiTe lab, a website built to house multiple simulation platforms. A user can create an account and use simulation platforms created by the mBiTe team. WetSpace also adds functionality that is not available on each respective simulation platform. Demo WetSpace Amazon Mturk study - NIMBUS, a website used to run an online study. This website is hosted on my CSE account and was used to run an online HRI study, this study is planned to be done in person soon.
